branchCategory.name: KT
branchCategory.description: <P>The KT10 and KT12 series are regulators used in gas delivery systems to reduce the pressure to a lower delivery (outlet) pressure.  These regulators are available with a self-relieving (venting) option, which vents process gas through the regulator cap directly into the atmosphere, or a non-relieving (non-venting) option, which must be used in combination with hazardous gases.</P>

branchItem.name: KT10, Single Stage Regulator for High Pressure Applications, Low Flow
branchItem.description: <P>The KT10 and KT12 series are regulators used in gas delivery systems to reduce the pressure to a lower delivery (outlet) pressure.  These regulators are available with a self-relieving (venting) option, which vents process gas through the regulator cap directly into the atmosphere, or a non-relieving (non-venting) option, which must be used in combination with hazardous gases.</P>

branchItem.name: KT10, Single Stage Regulator, Welded Connection, Low Flow
branchItem.description: <P>The KT10 and KT12 series are regulators used in gas delivery systems to reduce the pressure to a lower delivery (outlet) pressure.  These regulators are available with a self-relieving (venting) option, which vents process gas through the regulator cap directly into the atmosphere, or a non-relieving (non-venting) option, which must be used in combination with hazardous gases.</P>

branchItem.description: <P>The KT10 and KT12 series are regulators used in gas delivery systems to reduce the pressure to a lower delivery (outlet) pressure.  These regulators are available with a self-relieving (venting) option, which vents process gas through the regulator cap directly into the atmosphere, or a non-relieving (non-venting) option, which must be used in combination with hazardous gases.</P>
